```{css echo=FALSE}
/* ---- HANDOUT STYLE OPTIONS ---- */
:root {
  --slide-image-width: 40%;                  /* size of slide preview image */
  --slide-image-border: 2px solid lightgray; /* border style around preview image */
  --slide-text-size-scale: 1;                /* text size factor */
  --slide-content-color: #999;               /* color of text from slide content (use `unset` for default) */
  --slide-notes-color: unset;                /* color of text from slide's presenter notes */
  --slide-notes-border-top: 1px solid #ddd;  /* border style above presenter notes */
  --slide-lined-notes-lines: 5;              /* number of lines in lined notes area */
  --slide-lined-notes-line-height: 2em;      /* height of lines in lined notes */
  --slide-lined-notes-line-color: #bbb;      /* color of lines in lined notes */
  --slide-lined-notes-line-width: 1px;       /* width of the lines in lined notes */
  --pagedjs-margin-top: 0.33in;              /* page margins, {pagedown::html_paged only} */
  --pagedjs-margin-right: 0.33in;
  --pagedjs-margin-bottom: 0.33in;
  --pagedjs-margin-left: 0.33in;
}
```
